TopicTitle: Entering + exiting Astronaut Complex breaks the save/game

Articles.Content:
Mods installed: Engineering Redux, Astronomers Visual Pack.

So i started a new game with mods installed.

after 10-15 missions upon entering and exiting Astronaut Complex the game bugs out.

enterin any building after that makes pressing any button impossible. cant launch, cant exit building, cant press esc for main menu.

alt + f12 debug log says: "[Exception]: NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object" when pressing exit building.

anyone know what is up? cause of mods?
I am experiencing very similar things after planting the flag on the Mun contract, lost control of all kerbals and cannot get around the launchpad or base

I started a NEW game again.

NO mods at all.

same thing happens after 10-15 missions.

i cant ever use astronaut complex ever again it seems....

Devs check these threads ever?

Edited December 27, 2014 by Cuna
